thread.title: Pope Francis tells mafia they can't be Christians

title: Pope Francis tells mafia they can't be Christians
text:
Pope Francis tells mafia they can't be Christians 9:48am EDT - 01:13 
Pope Francis on Wednesday told members of the Mafia in Italy, where many go to Church and worship openly, that they cannot call themselves Christians because they ''carry death in their souls''. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Pope Francis on Wednesday told members of the Mafia in Italy, where many go to Church and worship openly, that they cannot call themselves Christians because they "carry death in their souls".
